name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Advanced Network Technology

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Ad: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Advanced Network Technology The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Advanced Network Technology is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: CCNA: Cisco Certified Network Engineer

notes: Required Courses: 12 s.h. Students seeking this CUGS are required to successfully complete (grade of D- or better) the four courses in the order listed below:
Total Required Credits for the Program: 12 s.h. Advisor Mike Chu Robinson Hall 328K 856.256.4805 chum@rowan.edu This CUGS, being an advanced CUGS, has a course outside the listed courses noted above.
